评论详情: Used this for a holiday party and got complimented on the look of this jacket all night. My brother paid triple the price for a very similar jacket at a department store. The fit was exactly what I was expecting, I didn’t have to downsize or upsize to account for it coming from overseas. The quality of the material feels great, and the look is top shelf. If I had to find something to complain about it would be the buttons on the cuff, they’re a little loose and jingly for my taste, but it worked out perfectly for the holiday party I used this at.  10/10 would recommend.

评论概述: Perfect for our outdoor New Years Eve wedding
评论详情: Really nice jacket. Fit right, the velvet is rich excellant quality especially for the price. We were pleasantly surprised to be very honest. Needed to be steamed before wearing but thats normal. Not too heavy not to thin, my husband wore it all day comfortably. He got a lot of compliments on the beautiful shade of red. Not an orange red, its a deep yet bright red.

GREAT FOR IT'S VALUE. It was a Christmas gift but I couldn't wait lol I went ahead and gave it to my husband allot sooner. It's beautiful!!!! The fabric is soft the color is as expected in general it's allot nicer than I expected and fits just right!!! Thank you so much!!

Quality is pretty good, fits a tiny bit slim. It is VERY heavy which is somewhat expected for the velvet-esque finish.  I could probably use it in winter on the east coast and be ok so fair warning for warmer venues.  I enjoyed it and color is good.
Beautiful look for a low price.  Fits well.  This is my 4th Coofandi jacket!

Nice jacket but fits a little smaller than the other ones I have gotten from the same brand. I ordered a large and it was slightly tighter in the shoulders from the other jackets I have from them. Might have been the thicker, velvet material this is made from but my suggestion is to order a size up.
Well made and fit just right. Classy. I would recommend.
Perfect for a special occasion. Looks great, especially for the cost.
I ordered this for my husband to wear for santacon, he got so many compliments! Really good quality

I took a HUGE risk buying this and I can't believe a such an affordable jacket actually turned heads the way it did at several events including a wedding. I'll be honest this jacket is poorly made and you get what you pay for, but buttons busted off, and there were strings hanging that needed to be cut off , but at first glance for a night you'll be the talk of the party and people will be talking to you and about you.
